author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

@alja had a question on if `BareRootProductGetter.h` could be made a public header in `FWCore/FWLite` package, because FireworksWeb needs to use a different mechanism to provide the current file than what `BareRootProductGetter` implements. I created a customization point for FireworksWeb by moving nearly all functionality of `BareRootProductGetter` into a new `BareRootProductGetterBase`, except the logic to get the current file in `BareRootProductGetterBase::getIt()`. I added a new pure virtual function `currentFile()`, that is overridden and implemented in `BareRootProductGetter`. FireworksWeb can now provide a different implementation by inheriting from `BareRootProductGetterBase` and implementing only the `currentFile()`.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/987

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, unit tests pass.
title: Create BareRootProductGetterBase for FireworksWeb
